user.description: Aging is optional.

fullText:
Today I submitted the results of our latest human study:  participants showed a biological age 5.8y (PhenoAge) & 4.1y (epigenetic age) lower than their chronological age after our 3-month treatment. 
Yet I feel sad, the speed at which we improve outpaces the current trial system.
